name: AIA_ClassificationModelVersion_Sub_Prompting
description: Interface to display Prompt for Classification Model
sail_code:
{
  rule!AIA_LlmOptionField(
    value: ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.llm],
    saveInto: ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.llm],
    defaultValue: rule!AIA_DefaultModel(),
    required: true
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bf997137-f6fd-4bc0-9f80-aecac9328d8d",
    labelPosition: "ABOVE",
    helpTooltip: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:00661ea5-bded-4f86-96b3-91d4359b28a6",
    value: a!defaultValue(
      ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.role],
      rule!AIA_Classification_DefaultPromptRole(
        classificationModelVersion: ri!classificationModelVersion
      )
    ),
    placeholder: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:eee0d6c2-2740-4b32-8feb-2d76921a8b0d",
    saveInto: ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.role],
    characterLimit: 4000,
    height: "MEDIUM",
    required: false,
    showCharacterCount: false
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bdd579f6-3b22-433e-9a38-762e59ccaaa6",
    labelPosition: "ABOVE",
    helpTooltip: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:705559e8-c6ae-477c-b1c8-9524780af63b",
    value: ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.instructions],
    saveInto: ri!classificationModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.instructions],
    characterLimit: 4000,
    height: "MEDIUM",
    required: false,
    showCharacterCount: false
  )
}
